import React, { useState } from 'react' import FeedContainer from './components/feed/FeedContainer.jsx'; import Footer from './components/footer/Footer.jsx' import Header from './components/header/Header.jsx' import NavItem from './components/navigation/NavItem.jsx'; import VideoHeader from './components/header/VIdeoHeader.jsx'; import './styles/index.css' import book_img from './img/book.svg' import calendar_img from './img/calendar.svg' import office_img from './img/office.svg' import donations_img from './img/donations.svg' import Modal from './components/modal/Modal.jsx' import $ from 'jquery' function App() { const [modalActive, setModalActive] = useState(false) const [btnNumClick, setbtnNumClick] = useState(0); modalActive ? $('body').css('overflow', 'hidden') : $('body').css('overflow', 'overlay'); return (
); } export default App;
